org.hps.recon.tracking.gbl

Class GblSimpleHelix

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hps.recon.tracking.gbl.GblSimpleHelix

  • public class GblSimpleHelix
extends Object
    wrapper class around GblSimpleHelix JNA functions

    Allows access to the GBL C++ simple helix class which can follow a ideal helix through space allowing for simulating a "perfect" track in examples and comparison of our tracks to a "perfect" helix.
